name: CorpData
heroDescription: Access real-time insights into our company's growth, projects, and people. We believe in openness and accountability.

about.title: About CorpData
about.description1: CorpData is a leading technology firm dedicated to solving complex problems through innovative software solutions. Founded in 2020, we have grown from a small startup to a global team of passionate experts.
about.description2: Our culture is built on transparency, continuous learning, and a relentless drive for excellence. We open our data to the public because we believe trust is earned through visibility.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To become the world's most trusted and transparent technology partner, driving global innovation.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To deliver high-quality, scalable digital products while maintaining an open ecosystem for our employees, clients, and the community.

employeesPage.title: Meet Our Team
employeesPage.description: The talented individuals driving innovation at CorpData. Browse our list of dedicated professionals across various departments.

projectsPage.title: Our Projects
projectsPage.description: Discover the impactful work we deliver for our clients. From ongoing initiatives to successfully completed milestones.

metadata.title: CorpData - Enterprise Insights
metadata.description: Transparency and data accessibility for the modern enterprise.

footer.description: Empowering transparency and innovation through open data access.
